name: Talking Great White: My Pet Shark PRO
name_original: Talking Great White: My Pet Shark PRO
description:
Talking Great White is your pet shark on your iPhone/iPod Touch. You can talk to him and he will repeat everything you say with a deep shark voice.

You can feed him, pet him, poke him or even grab his tail to make him angry.
You can also swim around or under him and also you can play fetch with him. You can even get him to break the iPhone glass.

Record funny and hilarious videos, save them to your library and send them as MMS, upload them to Facebook or send them by email.

You can also record PetCam videos. PetCam videos records both you and the Raptor in the same video. Check out screenshots to see PetCam in action.

*******************************************************************
04/02/2011 – Featured by Apple in the “New & Noteworthy” of the Action, Adventure and Entertainment categories

***** HOW TO PLAY *****
- Talk to him and he will repeat everything you say with a deep shark voice.
- Pet him and he will really like it.
- Feed him with his favorite food, a Juicy Yellowfin Tuna.
- Poke his head or belly and he will try to bite your finger.
- Touch his tail and he will get very angry.
- Play fetch with him.
- Swim around and under him to see him from different angles.
- Release a Puffer fish and see how he reacts.
- Make him attack the camera.
- Make him break the iPhone glass.
- Record videos, save them to your library and send them as MMS, upload them to Facebook or send them by email.

*** WHY HE IS THE BEST ***
- Very detailed 3D Great White Shark character (the most detailed 3D talking character in the App Store hands down!)
- Very realistic ocean and sea surface environments.
- Cool shark and underwater sound effects.
- Very realistic mouth and facial movements when he is talking.
- Optimized for iPhone 5 

*** IMPORTANT ***
- If you are an iPod Touch owner, you must plug an earphone with a microphone to talk to him.
- If you are and iPhone 1st generation owner or an iPhone 3G owner, animations can be sluggish and slow.
